document_data.name: Mud mephit
document_data.mainbody: '''Mud mephits''' were [[mephit]]s composed of [[water]] and [[Earth (element)|earth]]. They were slow, greedy and falsely polite, constantly complaining and seeking attention.
document_data.Ecology: Mud mephit wings were an [[alchemical]] ingredient. When the wings of [[clay]] and mud were harvested, they quickly detrained and fell apart. These wings could be processed into a suspension of muddy goo, that, in turn, when mixed with a certain alchemical sublimate to create an ''[[elixir of poison resistance]]''.
